
## About Me

I'm a passionate game developer with experience in Unity and a strong foundation in mathematical concepts. My work spans educational games, algorithm development, and procedural animation. I thrive on creating immersive experiences and solving complex problems with efficient solutions.

[![My LinkedIn](https://img.shields.io/badge/LinkedIn%20Profile-ResitKaya-blue?logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,)](https://www.linkedin.com/in/resitkaya/)
